name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Python Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in **Python** and **SQL** application development. Demonstrated expertise in **API development**, building scalable **distributed systems**, and managing **concurrency** effectively. Proficient in deploying and managing containerized applications using **Docker** and **Kubernetes**, ensuring high availability and performance in cloud environments. Experienced in configuring automation tools like **Ansible** and CI/CD with **TeamCity**, facilitating seamless deployment processes. 

In addition to core Python capabilities, I have a robust background in developing advanced applications across various domains, including healthcare and finance. Proficient in building AI/ML-powered platforms with a focus on predictive analytics and real-time processing. I also implement **monitoring** and **alerting** strategies to ensure system reliability. Skilled in cloud services, particularly **GCP**, and adept at rapid **prototyping** and **sketching** for efficient solution development.
